contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced stub|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} {{Coord|56|34|5.12|N|8|32|8.48|E|display=title}} '''Oddesund''' is a strait in the [[Denmark|Danish]] [[Limfjorden]]. A bridge spans the fjord connecting the mainland of [[Jutland]] with [[Vendsyssel-Thy|Thy]]. According to the [[Heimskringla]], a battle took place in Oddasund between the Swedish king [[Jorund]] and a Norwegian pirate from [[HÃ¥logaland]]. The area is a popular for tourists and it offers [[recreational fishing]] opportunities. [[Category:Straits of Denmark]] {{Denmark-geo-stub}}
